name: Transition & Emergency Housing
description: Homeless Prenatal Program offers transitional and emergency housing for pregnant and postpartum clients. Jelani House welcomes residents at any stage of their pregnancies and/or during their infant’s first year. As a transitional living program, Jelani House aspires to build community, provide 1:1 and group support and ensure residents exit to permanent housing. The Transition & Emergency Housing Program services: - Comprehensive Housing Support: Immediate housing alongside wrap-around support t
